answers.answer: I am sorry to hear that he had to be born early, but am so happy to hear that he is doing well! Congratulations and you and your little man will be in my prayers to remain healthy and happy!

Well I'm glad to hear he's doing well! He's gorgeous. I hope he's able to get whatever care he needs and that he's able to go home soon. I really hope you're recovering as well. Take care and keep us updated. Congratulations mommy!!! :)**** HAPPY BIRTHDAY NOAH ****
CONGRATULATIONS on his arrival!! He is adorable.  I hope you and your little man are recovering and that he comes home soon.  What was his due date?

wow hun im sorry that it had to happen like that but congrats on ur baby boy! atleast he is in this world alive and doing well!it is sort of wierd seeing the photos of him and thinking that i have a baby like him inside me right now! beacuse i dont think that my belly looks big enough to be holding a big normally formed baby in there lol!!i guess looking at ur pics has sort of made reality settle in a bit more now lol! i have one of those!!CONGRATS he is so beautiful lol and thankyou for helping reality settle in a bit better for me lol!
My due date was 6/4/09. Thank you ladies for your kind words. =)
He is beautiful!  I too am sorry that he had to come early, but am very glad to hear that you both are doing well!!  Please keep us posted on his/your progress!!CoNgRaTuLaTiOnS!!
First of all, congratulations. The health of the both of you is the most important thing, and thank god that the both of you are OK. He looks so adorable. May God Bless him and keep him healthy.

question: Hi Ladies,I just wanted to let you all know that I went in to the hospital 4/5/09 and was diagnosed with severe preeclampsia and had Noah on 4/8/09 at 6:01 pm. He weighed 3 lbs. 9 ozs. and is 17 inches long, he is currently in the NICU but is doing very well.
title: I had Noah on 4/8/09 2 months early
